Q4.7:
2023 was an exceptional year with a final cleaned yield of 2092 lb per acre. We did have Mexican Bean Beetle damage and a small amount of white mold. Pyganic and Neemix were used for bean beetle control and Stargus for white mold control. One application with some foliar feeding applied at same time.
2021 was a complete bust, losing 70 acres of black turtle beans and 55 acres of snap beans to Mexican bean beetle. Sprayed Neem oil for control to no avail.
Q5.3: We like to watch others and see how they do before adopting new management practices and marketing opportunities, but we adopt them before the average operation in my region.
